title: Encore of Episode 9: Aziz Ansari on Modern Love
description: Hidden Brain host Shankar Vedantam talks to comedian Aziz Ansari — star of Master of None and coauthor of Modern Romance — about Tinder, texting and how dating is a bit like... buying jam.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
